00033 /* Shader Manager */
00034 
00035 SVMShaderManager::SVMShaderManager()
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 SVMShaderManager::~SVMShaderManager()
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 void SVMShaderManager::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress)
00044 {
00045     if(!need_update)
00046         return;
00047 
00048     /* test if we need to update */
00049     device_free(device, dscene);
00050 
00051     /* svm_nodes */
00052     vector<int4> svm_nodes;
00053     size_t i;
00054 
00055     for(i = 0; i < scene->shaders.size(); i++) {
00056         svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(NODE_SHADER_JUMP, 0, 0, 0));
00057         svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(NODE_SHADER_JUMP, 0, 0, 0));
00058     }
00059     
00060     bool sunsky_done = false;
00061     bool use_multi_closure = device->info.advanced_shading;
00062 
00063     for(i = 0; i < scene->shaders.size(); i++) {
00064         Shader *shader = scene->shaders[i];
00065 
00066         if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00067 
00068         assert(shader->graph);
00069 
00070         if(shader->sample_as_light && shader->has_surface_emission)
00071             scene->light_manager->need_update = true;
00072 
00073         SVMCompiler compiler(scene->shader_manager, scene->image_manager,
00074             use_multi_closure);
00075         compiler.sunsky = (sunsky_done)? NULL: &dscene->data.sunsky;
00076         compiler.background = ((int)i == scene->default_background);
00077         compiler.compile(shader, svm_nodes, i);
00078         if(!compiler.sunsky)
00079             sunsky_done = true;
00080     }
00081 
00082     dscene->svm_nodes.copy((uint4*)&svm_nodes[0], svm_nodes.size());
00083     device->tex_alloc("__svm_nodes", dscene->svm_nodes);
00084 
00085     for(i = 0; i < scene->shaders.size(); i++) {
00086         Shader *shader = scene->shaders[i];
00087         shader->need_update = false;
00088     }
00089 
00090     device_update_common(device, dscene, scene, progress);
00091 
00092     need_update = false;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void SVMShaderManager::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00096 {
00097     device_free_common(device, dscene);
00098 
00099     device->tex_free(dscene->svm_nodes);
00100     dscene->svm_nodes.clear();
00101 }

00105 SVMCompiler::SVMCompiler(ShaderManager *shader_manager_, ImageManager *image_manager_, bool use_multi_closure_)
00106 {
00107     shader_manager = shader_manager_;
00108     image_manager = image_manager_;
00109     sunsky = NULL;
00110     max_stack_use = 0;
00111     current_type = SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE;
00112     current_shader = NULL;
00113     background = false;
00114     mix_weight_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00115     use_multi_closure = use_multi_closure_;
00116 }
00117 
00118 int SVMCompiler::stack_size(ShaderSocketType type)
00119 {
00120     if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT)
00121         return 1;
00122     else if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR)
00123         return 3;
00124     else if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR)
00125         return 3;
00126     else if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL)
00127         return 3;
00128     else if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_POINT)
00129         return 3;
00130     else if(type == SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE)
00131         return 0;
00132 
00133     assert(0);
00134     return 0;
00135 }
00136 
00137 int SVMCompiler::stack_find_offset(ShaderSocketType type)
00138 {
00139     int size = stack_size(type);
00140     int offset = -1;
00141     
00142     /* find free space in stack & mark as used */
00143     for(int i = 0, num_unused = 0; i < SVM_STACK_SIZE; i++) {
00144         if(active_stack.users[i]) num_unused = 0;
00145         else num_unused++;
00146 
00147         if(num_unused == size) {
00148             offset = i+1 - size;
00149             max_stack_use = max(i+1, max_stack_use);
00150 
00151             while(i >= offset)
00152                 active_stack.users[i--] = 1;
00153 
00154             return offset;
00155         }
00156     }
00157 
00158     fprintf(stderr, "Out of SVM stack space.\n");
00159     assert(0);
00160 
00161     return offset;
00162 }
00163 
00164 void SVMCompiler::stack_clear_offset(ShaderSocketType type, int offset)
00165 {
00166     int size = stack_size(type);
00167 
00168     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00169         active_stack.users[offset + i]--;
00170 }
00171 
00172 void SVMCompiler::stack_backup(StackBackup& backup, set<ShaderNode*>& done)
00173 {
00174     backup.done = done;
00175     backup.stack = active_stack;
00176 
00177     foreach(ShaderNode *node, current_graph->nodes) {
00178         foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs)
00179             backup.offsets.push_back(input->stack_offset);
00180         foreach(ShaderOutput *output, node->outputs)
00181             backup.offsets.push_back(output->stack_offset);
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void SVMCompiler::stack_restore(StackBackup& backup, set<ShaderNode*>& done)
00186 {
00187     int i = 0;
00188 
00189     done = backup.done;
00190     active_stack = backup.stack;
00191 
00192     foreach(ShaderNode *node, current_graph->nodes) {
00193         foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs)
00194             input->stack_offset = backup.offsets[i++];
00195         foreach(ShaderOutput *output, node->outputs)
00196             output->stack_offset = backup.offsets[i++];
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 void SVMCompiler::stack_assign(ShaderInput *input)
00201 {
00202     /* stack offset assign? */
00203     if(input->stack_offset == SVM_STACK_INVALID) {
00204         if(input->link) {
00205             /* linked to output -> use output offset */
00206             input->stack_offset = input->link->stack_offset;
00207         }
00208         else {
00209             /* not linked to output -> add nodes to load default value */
00210             input->stack_offset = stack_find_offset(input->type);
00211 
00212             if(input->type == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT) {
00213                 add_node(NODE_VALUE_F, __float_as_int(input->value.x), input->stack_offset);
00214             }
00215             else if(input->type == SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR ||
00216                 input->type == SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL ||
00217                 input->type == SHADER_SOCKET_POINT ||
00218                 input->type == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR) {
00219 
00220                 add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, input->stack_offset);
00221                 add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, input->value);
00222             }
00223             else /* should not get called for closure */
00224                 assert(0);
00225         }
00226     }
00227 }
00228 
00229 void SVMCompiler::stack_assign(ShaderOutput *output)
00230 {
00231     /* if no stack offset assigned yet, find one */
00232     if(output->stack_offset == SVM_STACK_INVALID)
00233         output->stack_offset = stack_find_offset(output->type);
00234 }
00235 
00236 void SVMCompiler::stack_link(ShaderInput *input, ShaderOutput *output)
00237 {
00238     if(output->stack_offset == SVM_STACK_INVALID) {
00239         assert(input->link);
00240         assert(stack_size(output->type) == stack_size(input->link->type));
00241 
00242         output->stack_offset = input->link->stack_offset;
00243 
00244         int size = stack_size(output->type);
00245 
00246         for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00247             active_stack.users[output->stack_offset + i]++;
00248     }
00249 }
00250 
00251 void SVMCompiler::stack_clear_users(ShaderNode *node, set<ShaderNode*>& done)
00252 {
00253     /* optimization we should add:
00254        find and lower user counts for outputs for which all inputs are done.
00255        this is done before the node is compiled, under the assumption that the
00256        node will first load all inputs from the stack and then writes its
00257        outputs. this used to work, but was disabled because it gave trouble
00258        with inputs getting stack positions assigned */
00259 
00260     foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs) {
00261         ShaderOutput *output = input->link;
00262 
00263         if(output && output->stack_offset != SVM_STACK_INVALID) {
00264             bool all_done = true;
00265 
00266             /* optimization we should add: verify if in->parent is actually used */
00267             foreach(ShaderInput *in, output->links)
00268                 if(in->parent != node && done.find(in->parent) == done.end())
00269                     all_done = false;
00270 
00271             if(all_done) {
00272                 stack_clear_offset(output->type, output->stack_offset);
00273                 output->stack_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00274 
00275                 foreach(ShaderInput *in, output->links)
00276                     in->stack_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00277             }
00278         }
00279     }
00280 }
00281 
00282 void SVMCompiler::stack_clear_temporary(ShaderNode *node)
00283 {
00284     foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs) {
00285         if(!input->link && input->stack_offset != SVM_STACK_INVALID) {
00286             stack_clear_offset(input->type, input->stack_offset);
00287             input->stack_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00288         }
00289     }
00290 }
00291 
00292 uint SVMCompiler::encode_uchar4(uint x, uint y, uint z, uint w)
00293 {
00294     assert(x <= 255);
00295     assert(y <= 255);
00296     assert(z <= 255);
00297     assert(w <= 255);
00298 
00299     return (x) | (y << 8) | (z << 16) | (w << 24);
00300 }
00301 
00302 void SVMCompiler::add_node(int a, int b, int c, int d)
00303 {
00304     svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(a, b, c, d));
00305 }
00306 
00307 void SVMCompiler::add_node(NodeType type, int a, int b, int c)
00308 {
00309     svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(type, a, b, c));
00310 }
00311 
00312 void SVMCompiler::add_node(NodeType type, const float3& f)
00313 {
00314     svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(type,
00315         __float_as_int(f.x),
00316         __float_as_int(f.y),
00317         __float_as_int(f.z)));
00318 }
00319 
00320 void SVMCompiler::add_node(const float4& f)
00321 {
00322     svm_nodes.push_back(make_int4(
00323         __float_as_int(f.x),
00324         __float_as_int(f.y),
00325         __float_as_int(f.z),
00326         __float_as_int(f.w)));
00327 }
00328 
00329 void SVMCompiler::add_array(float4 *f, int num)
00330 {
00331     for(int i = 0; i < num; i++)
00332         add_node(f[i]);
00333 }

00345 bool SVMCompiler::node_skip_input(ShaderNode *node, ShaderInput *input)
00346 {
00347     /* nasty exception .. */
00348     if(current_type == SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT && input->link && input->link->parent->name == ustring("bump"))
00349         return true;
00350     
00351     return false;
00352 }
00353 
00354 void SVMCompiler::find_dependencies(set<ShaderNode*>& dependencies, const set<ShaderNode*>& done, ShaderInput *input)
00355 {
00356     ShaderNode *node = (input->link)? input->link->parent: NULL;
00357 
00358     if(node && done.find(node) == done.end()) {
00359         foreach(ShaderInput *in, node->inputs)
00360             if(!node_skip_input(node, in))
00361                 find_dependencies(dependencies, done, in);
00362 
00363         dependencies.insert(node);
00364     }
00365 }
00366 
00367 void SVMCompiler::generate_svm_nodes(const set<ShaderNode*>& nodes, set<ShaderNode*>& done)
00368 {
00369     bool nodes_done;
00370 
00371     do {
00372         nodes_done = true;
00373 
00374         foreach(ShaderNode *node, nodes) {
00375             if(done.find(node) == done.end()) {
00376                 bool inputs_done = true;
00377 
00378                 foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs)
00379                     if(!node_skip_input(node, input))
00380                         if(input->link && done.find(input->link->parent) == done.end())
00381                             inputs_done = false;
00382 
00383                 if(inputs_done) {
00384                     node->compile(*this);
00385                     stack_clear_users(node, done);
00386                     stack_clear_temporary(node);
00387                     done.insert(node);
00388                 }
00389                 else
00390                     nodes_done = false;
00391             }
00392         }
00393     } while(!nodes_done);
00394 }
00395 
00396 void SVMCompiler::generate_closure(ShaderNode *node, set<ShaderNode*>& done)
00397 {
00398     if(node->name == ustring("mix_closure") || node->name == ustring("add_closure")) {
00399         ShaderInput *fin = node->input("Fac");
00400         ShaderInput *cl1in = node->input("Closure1");
00401         ShaderInput *cl2in = node->input("Closure2");
00402 
00403         /* execute dependencies for mix weight */
00404         if(fin) {
00405             set<ShaderNode*> dependencies;
00406             find_dependencies(dependencies, done, fin);
00407             generate_svm_nodes(dependencies, done);
00408 
00409             /* add mix node */
00410             stack_assign(fin);
00411         }
00412 
00413         int mix_offset = svm_nodes.size();
00414 
00415         if(fin)
00416             add_node(NODE_MIX_CLOSURE, fin->stack_offset, 0, 0);
00417         else
00418             add_node(NODE_ADD_CLOSURE, 0, 0, 0);
00419 
00420         /* generate code for closure 1
00421            note we backup all compiler state and restore it afterwards, so one
00422            closure choice doesn't influence the other*/
00423         if(cl1in->link) {
00424             StackBackup backup;
00425             stack_backup(backup, done);
00426 
00427             generate_closure(cl1in->link->parent, done);
00428             add_node(NODE_END, 0, 0, 0);
00429 
00430             stack_restore(backup, done);
00431         }
00432         else
00433             add_node(NODE_END, 0, 0, 0);
00434 
00435         /* generate code for closure 2 */
00436         int cl2_offset = svm_nodes.size();
00437 
00438         if(cl2in->link) {
00439             StackBackup backup;
00440             stack_backup(backup, done);
00441 
00442             generate_closure(cl2in->link->parent, done);
00443             add_node(NODE_END, 0, 0, 0);
00444 
00445             stack_restore(backup, done);
00446         }
00447         else
00448             add_node(NODE_END, 0, 0, 0);
00449 
00450         /* set jump for mix node, -1 because offset is already
00451            incremented when this jump is added to it */
00452         svm_nodes[mix_offset].z = cl2_offset - mix_offset - 1;
00453 
00454         done.insert(node);
00455         stack_clear_users(node, done);
00456         stack_clear_temporary(node);
00457     }
00458     else {
00459         /* execute dependencies for closure */
00460         foreach(ShaderInput *in, node->inputs) {
00461             if(!node_skip_input(node, in) && in->link) {
00462                 set<ShaderNode*> dependencies;
00463                 find_dependencies(dependencies, done, in);
00464                 generate_svm_nodes(dependencies, done);
00465             }
00466         }
00467 
00468         /* compile closure itself */
00469         node->compile(*this);
00470         stack_clear_users(node, done);
00471         stack_clear_temporary(node);
00472 
00473         if(node->name == ustring("emission"))
00474             current_shader->has_surface_emission = true;
00475         if(node->name == ustring("transparent"))
00476             current_shader->has_surface_transparent = true;
00477 
00478         /* end node is added outside of this */
00479     }
00480 }
00481 
00482 void SVMCompiler::generate_multi_closure(ShaderNode *node, set<ShaderNode*>& done, uint in_offset)
00483 {
00484     /* todo: the weaks point here is that unlike the single closure sampling 
00485        we will evaluate all nodes even if they are used as input for closures
00486        that are unused. it's not clear what would be the best way to skip such
00487        nodes at runtime, especially if they are tangled up  */
00488 
00489     if(node->name == ustring("mix_closure") || node->name == ustring("add_closure")) {
00490         ShaderInput *fin = node->input("Fac");
00491         ShaderInput *cl1in = node->input("Closure1");
00492         ShaderInput *cl2in = node->input("Closure2");
00493 
00494         uint out1_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00495         uint out2_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00496 
00497         if(fin) {
00498             /* mix closure */
00499             set<ShaderNode*> dependencies;
00500             find_dependencies(dependencies, done, fin);
00501             generate_svm_nodes(dependencies, done);
00502 
00503             stack_assign(fin);
00504 
00505             if(cl1in->link)
00506                 out1_offset = stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00507             if(cl2in->link)
00508                 out2_offset = stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00509 
00510             add_node(NODE_MIX_CLOSURE, 
00511                 encode_uchar4(fin->stack_offset, in_offset, out1_offset, out2_offset));
00512         }
00513         else {
00514             /* add closure */
00515             out1_offset = in_offset;
00516             out2_offset = in_offset;
00517         }
00518 
00519         if(cl1in->link) {
00520             generate_multi_closure(cl1in->link->parent, done, out1_offset);
00521 
00522             if(fin)
00523                 stack_clear_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, out1_offset);
00524         }
00525 
00526         if(cl2in->link) {
00527             generate_multi_closure(cl2in->link->parent, done, out2_offset);
00528 
00529             if(fin)
00530                 stack_clear_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, out2_offset);
00531         }
00532     }
00533     else {
00534         /* execute dependencies for closure */
00535         foreach(ShaderInput *in, node->inputs) {
00536             if(!node_skip_input(node, in) && in->link) {
00537                 set<ShaderNode*> dependencies;
00538                 find_dependencies(dependencies, done, in);
00539                 generate_svm_nodes(dependencies, done);
00540             }
00541         }
00542 
00543         mix_weight_offset = in_offset;
00544 
00545         /* compile closure itself */
00546         node->compile(*this);
00547         stack_clear_users(node, done);
00548         stack_clear_temporary(node);
00549 
00550         mix_weight_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00551 
00552         if(node->name == ustring("emission"))
00553             current_shader->has_surface_emission = true;
00554         if(node->name == ustring("transparent"))
00555             current_shader->has_surface_transparent = true;
00556 
00557         /* end node is added outside of this */
00558     }
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 void SVMCompiler::compile_type(Shader *shader, ShaderGraph *graph, ShaderType type)
00563 {
00564     /* Converting a shader graph into svm_nodes that can be executed
00565      * sequentially on the virtual machine is fairly simple. We can keep
00566      * looping over nodes and each time all the inputs of a node are
00567      * ready, we add svm_nodes for it that read the inputs from the
00568      * stack and write outputs back to the stack.
00569      *
00570      * With the SVM, we always sample only a single closure. We can think
00571      * of all closures nodes as a binary tree with mix closures as inner
00572      * nodes and other closures as leafs. The SVM will traverse that tree,
00573      * each time deciding to go left or right depending on the mix weights,
00574      * until a closure is found.
00575      *
00576      * We only execute nodes that are needed for the mix weights and chosen
00577      * closure.
00578      */
00579 
00580     current_type = type;
00581     current_graph = graph;
00582 
00583     /* get input in output node */
00584     ShaderNode *node = graph->output();
00585     ShaderInput *clin = NULL;
00586     
00587     if(type == SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE)
00588         clin = node->input("Surface");
00589     else if(type == SHADER_TYPE_VOLUME)
00590         clin = node->input("Volume");
00591     else if(type == SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT)
00592         clin = node->input("Displacement");
00593     else
00594         assert(0);
00595 
00596     /* clear all compiler state */
00597     memset(&active_stack, 0, sizeof(active_stack));
00598     svm_nodes.clear();
00599 
00600     foreach(ShaderNode *node, graph->nodes) {
00601         foreach(ShaderInput *input, node->inputs)
00602             input->stack_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00603         foreach(ShaderOutput *output, node->outputs)
00604             output->stack_offset = SVM_STACK_INVALID;
00605     }
00606 
00607     if(clin->link) {
00608         bool generate = false;
00609         if(type == SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE) {
00610             /* generate surface shader */
00611             generate = true;
00612             shader->has_surface = true;
00613         }
00614         else if(type == SHADER_TYPE_VOLUME) {
00615             /* generate volume shader */
00616             generate = true;
00617             shader->has_volume = true;
00618         }
00619         else if(type == SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT) {
00620             /* generate displacement shader */
00621             generate = true;
00622             shader->has_displacement = true;
00623         }
00624 
00625         if(generate) {
00626             set<ShaderNode*> done;
00627 
00628             if(use_multi_closure)
00629                 generate_multi_closure(clin->link->parent, done, SVM_STACK_INVALID);
00630             else
00631                 generate_closure(clin->link->parent, done);
00632         }
00633     }
00634 
00635     /* compile output node */
00636     node->compile(*this);
00637 
00638     add_node(NODE_END, 0, 0, 0);
00639 }
00640 
00641 void SVMCompiler::compile(Shader *shader, vector<int4>& global_svm_nodes, int index)
00642 {
00643     /* copy graph for shader with bump mapping */
00644     ShaderNode *node = shader->graph->output();
00645 
00646     if(node->input("Surface")->link && node->input("Displacement")->link)
00647         if(!shader->graph_bump)
00648             shader->graph_bump = shader->graph->copy();
00649 
00650     /* finalize */
00651     shader->graph->finalize(false, false);
00652     if(shader->graph_bump)
00653         shader->graph_bump->finalize(true, false);
00654 
00655     current_shader = shader;
00656 
00657     shader->has_surface = false;
00658     shader->has_surface_emission = false;
00659     shader->has_surface_transparent = false;
00660     shader->has_volume = false;
00661     shader->has_displacement = false;
00662 
00663     /* generate surface shader */
00664     compile_type(shader, shader->graph, SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE);
00665     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 0].y = global_svm_nodes.size();
00666     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 1].y = global_svm_nodes.size();
00667     global_svm_nodes.insert(global_svm_nodes.end(), svm_nodes.begin(), svm_nodes.end());
00668 
00669     if(shader->graph_bump) {
00670         compile_type(shader, shader->graph_bump, SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE);
00671         global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 1].y = global_svm_nodes.size();
00672         global_svm_nodes.insert(global_svm_nodes.end(), svm_nodes.begin(), svm_nodes.end());
00673     }
00674 
00675     /* generate volume shader */
00676     compile_type(shader, shader->graph, SHADER_TYPE_VOLUME);
00677     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 0].z = global_svm_nodes.size();
00678     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 1].z = global_svm_nodes.size();
00679     global_svm_nodes.insert(global_svm_nodes.end(), svm_nodes.begin(), svm_nodes.end());
00680 
00681     /* generate displacement shader */
00682     compile_type(shader, shader->graph, SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT);
00683     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 0].w = global_svm_nodes.size();
00684     global_svm_nodes[index*2 + 1].w = global_svm_nodes.size();
00685     global_svm_nodes.insert(global_svm_nodes.end(), svm_nodes.begin(), svm_nodes.end());
00686 }
00687 
00688 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
00689
